entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_FileCaptureNativeLogs #42820
  • Support Opt-in IIS Express Launch Setting for ASP.NET Core Templates #42818
    .NET 8 Planning
  • jQuery License outdated #42815
    7.0-rc1
  • Faster creating query string in 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Extensions.QueryBuilder' #42810
  • [7.0.100-rc.1.22365.7] Behavior difference when add Authentication in web applications #42808
    7.0-rc1
  • When the logging fields is all, the request query is not logging #42807
  • JS Client reconnection, HubConnection.ts. Incorrect number of reconnection attempts is logged. #42806
    Backlog
  • Issue with IAccessTokenProvider on iOS devices #42805

Closed

  • ProblemDetails is not returned for 404NotFound and 500Exception #4953
    7.0-preview7
  • failed to start process with commandline #42680
  • Explicit binding source should work for [FromBody] Stream body in Minimal APIs #41486
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ConfigureRouteHandlerJsonOptions naming #42718
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor component state is not preserved when handling errors #38757
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ValueProvider array of strings having a null value is processed wrong #40929
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Usage of ProblemDetails is inconsistent throughout ASP.NET Core #32957
    7.0-preview7
  • Skipped `internal` properties on InvokeAsync<T> calls #42768
  • Disable Tracing in production #42776
  • Allow @ref be used with existing declaration syntax, instead of having to declare it seperately #42804
  • Enable BindNever or BindingBehavior(BindingBehavior.Never) for Blazor WebAssembly Shared Project(Model) #42736
  • QuickGrid: QuickGridItemsProvider naming suggestion #42738
    Discussions
  • Kestrel: Wrong certificate used #42642

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • Do not treat warnings as errors for `SendHelixJob` #42826
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow Collection Default Value binding #42824
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix typo #42823
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add dotnet-sourcebuild-externals reference for user-jwts dependencies #42822
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_FileCaptureNativeLogs #42821
    area-runtime
  • Better support for HTTP/2 in SignalR .NET client #42817
    blocked, area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • [blazor] Obsolete InvokeUnmarshalled #42814
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • Allowing `nullable struct` with `AsParameters` attribute #42812
    area-web-frameworks
  • [draft][blazor] replace internal methods but keep them mockable #42811
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-rc.1.22368.21 #42803
    area-infrastructure
  • Leverage auto-registration of AuthNZ middlewares #42802
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Clean up localization files #42797
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Allowing explicit `FromBody` for raw body (`PipeReader` and `Stream`) #42816
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Forward port "Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience" #42813
    7.0-rc1
  • Avoid always setting request body parameter #42748
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Rename ConfigureRouteHandlerJsonOptions to ConfigureHttpJsonOptions #42747
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Backport/pr 42384 to release/7.0 preview7 #42809
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Backport/pr 42384 to release/7.0 preview7 #42741
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Remove unused namespace from webapi template #42798
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Task and ValueTask are not covariant #41719
    area-runtime
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • [SignalR] [.NET Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #42671
    area-signalr
  • Allow to bind StringValues for optional HTTP requests params with Minimal APIs #41789
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 7.0-preview7
  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: Complete support for UseHttps #42774
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • Trim identity #42675
    area-identity
  • HTTP/3: Avoid per-request cancellation token allocations #42685
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup AspNetCoreAnalyzers #42757
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42792
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42793
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42795
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Move builds to MacOS 11 #42791
    area-infrastructure
